creator: gls@gknw.net
text: Download page/mirror related and a bit late in the game for 2.2.11 but many (not all) of the links for the win32 source packages are pointing to the non -R2 file, which does not exist of course. I'd of never known except I was helping someone and they informed me they could not get the source so I had a look.

creator: trawick@apache.org
text: 2.2.11 superceded long ago, problem resolved with current downloads
